clinical_study.brief_title: The Use of Perfusion CT Derived Parameters as Early Acute Pancreatitis Severity Biomarker Compared to Clinico Biological Score
clinical_study.official_title: The Use of Perfusion CT Derived Parameters as Early Acute Pancreatitis Severity Biomarker Compared to Clinico Biological Score

brief_summary.textblock:
The investigators to establish whether early microvascular permeability parameter evaluated by perfusion-CT could be good biomarkers for severity in acute pancreatitis.
Therefore the investigators want to compare 48 hours-clinico-biological systemic inflammatory response syndrome score to initial microvascular permeability parameters ( ktrans - capillary membrane permeability factor- and pancreatic blood flow ) calculated by OLEA software using inclusion perfusion CT.

primary_outcome.measure: Relation between CT perfusion calculated k-trans and clinicobiological SIRS score in early phase of acute pancreatitis.
